mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( name, password, real_name, gender, phoneNum, position, school) VALUES(#{name}, #{password}, #{real_name}, #{gender}, #{phoneNum}, #{position}, #{school})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{user.name}, real_name = #{user.real_name}, password = #{user.password}, gender = #{user.gender}, phoneNum = #{user.phoneNum}, position = #{user.position}, school = #{user.school} WHERE id = #{uid}
